instructions: Connect a USB cable to your phone, then to a computer. A USB icon will appear at the top of the screen and the notification Connected as a media device or Connected as a camera appears briefly at the top of the screen. From any Home screen, tap the All apps icon. Tap Settings . Under Wireless & networks, tap More . Tap Tethering & portable hotspot . Tap the USB tethering check box. Your computer is now sharing your device's data connection. When done, safely disconnect the device from the computer.
